title.narrative: OUTPUT 4.1: EDUCATION SYSTEM MANAGEMENTAND ACCOUNTABILITY

description.narrative: Output 1: By 2024, education institutions and stakeholders have an improved education management system and accountability, which contributes to Adolescent Empowerment, Children With Disabilities, Early Childhood Development, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equitable Access To Quality Education (Covid), Learning Outcomes, Learning Outcomes (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2024, more children (5â€“17 years), especially adolescent girls, acquire competencies through access to quality and inclusive learning.

sector.narrative: Education analyses including OOSCI, Education Sector Analyses, etc.

Provision of training of school communities e.g. parent teacher associations, school management committees
System strengthening - inclusive education for other vulnerable children poorest quintile, ethnic/linguistic minorities, migrant children, non-citizens/undocumented children etc.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 1: By 2024, education institutions and stakeholders have an improved education management system and accountability

[Number of advocacy documents (guidance notes, etc.) developed to influence political decisions and management of the education system.] Nombre de documents de plaidoyer (notes d'orientation, etc) dvelopps pour influencer les dcisions politiques et la gestion du systme ducatif.
Number of schools implementing safe school protocols (COVID-19 prevention and control) [COVIDSitRep]

[Number of parent committees (COPA) and school management committees (COGES) in targeted areas with strengthened planning, monitoring and management capacities.] Nombre de comits de parents (COPA) et de comits de gestion d'coles (COGES) de zones cibles dots de capacits renforces en matire de planification, de suivi et de gestion.

[Existence of an operational national intersectoral strategy for non-formal education and vocational training.] Existence d'une stratgie intersectorielle nationale oprationnelle pour l'ducation non formelle et la formation professionnelle.
[Contribution to the provision of a national EMIS providing annual education data.] Contribution la mise disposition d'un SIGE national fournissant des donnes annuelles sur l'ducation.
